Name: Scavenger
Description:
Basic builder and worker unit.

Can attack ground units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Orders the unit to apply your currently selected spray to the terrain at the target location.
Root.Name: Spray

0002.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources.

Enables:
- Scavengers
0002.Name: Form Scavenger Nest

0002.Tooltip:
Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
Boosts the production of nearby structures and heals nearby units.
0002.Name: Form Feeding Pool

0002.Tooltip: Formed over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
0002.Name: Form Siphoner

0002.Tooltip:
Creates larva, which are in turn used to mutate various basic creatures.

Enables:
- Xayidlings
- Roamers
- Bile Pits from Scavengers
0002.Name: Form Xayid Den

0002.Tooltip:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Xayid ground units.

Enables:
- Roamers at the Xayid Den
- Scorpalisks at the Xayid Den
- Mendlings at the Xayid Den
0002.Name: Form Mutagen Chamber

0002.Tooltip:
Primary defensive structure. Must be placed near a Feeding Pool or Scavenger Nest.

Can attack ground and air units.
Detector
0002.Name: Form Bile Pit

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0003.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Xayidlings, Roamers, Scorpalisks, and Mendlings.

Enables:
- Casnolisks from the Xayid Den
0003.Name: Form Casnolisk Den

0003.Tooltip:
Creates larva, which can mutate into various Xayid beasts.

Enables:
- Revilers
- Ferrions
- Prowlers
- Spitters
0003.Name: Form Biomass Hatchery

0003.Tooltip:
Contains upgrades for Revilers, Prowlers and Spitters.

Enables:
- Massalisks at the Biomass Hatchery
0003.Name: Form Biomass Cavern

0003.Tooltip:
Creates Wasps, which are mutated into Xayid flyers.

Enables:
- Raptors
- Assailants
0003.Name: Form Avian Nest

0003.Tooltip:
Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Xayid fliers. Contains researches for Raptors and Xayithoans.

Enables:
- Exterminators at the Avian Nest
- Xayithoans at the Avian Nest
0003.Name: Form Catalyst Pit

0003.Tooltip:
Enables:
- Krakens at the Avian Nest
0003.Name: Form Sunken Warren

0003.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0003.Name: Cancel
